snippet: Rick Santorum is joining the crowd in South Carolina for a couple of events on Sunday, even as the New Hampshire primary to heat up.
abstract: Rick Santorum is joining the crowd in South Carolina for a couple of events on Sunday, even as the New Hampshire primary to heat up.
lead_paragraph: 6:03 p.m. | Updated DUBLIN, N.H. -- Rick Santorum and Gov. Rick Perry of Texas are joining the crowd and heading to South Carolina even as the New Hampshire primary heats up.

headline.main: Perry and Santorum Head to South Carolina on Sunday
